definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Air whips past the blades of a turbine, forcing it to spin.
sentences.chinese: 經過風輪葉片的空氣迫使風輪旋轉，風輪驅動電機。

sentences.english: Residents fled smack into the plume of air carrying radioactive debris.
sentences.chinese: 他們直接逃進了空氣中充斥着核碎片的地區。

sentences.english: Absorption is also dependent upon air flow rates and the partial pressure of the gases in the inspired air.
sentences.chinese: 吸收也取決於空氣流速和吸入空氣中的氣體分壓。

sentences.english: Absorption is also dependent upon air flow rates and the partial pressure of the gases in the inspired air.
sentences.chinese: 吸收也取決於空氣流速和吸入空氣中的氣體分壓。

sentences.english: There were laughter and song in the air.
sentences.chinese: 麻雀在吱吱喳喳地叫着，空氣中飄蕩着歡歌笑語。

sentences.english: Few data on air pollution exposure and risk of venous thrombosis are available.
sentences.chinese: 但是關於空氣污染與靜脈血栓關係的數據卻很有限。

sentences.english: Oil-free compressors of course, are the logical choice for instrument-air supplies.
sentences.chinese: 自然，無油壓縮機必然被選擇爲儀用空氣供給者。

sentences.english: The effect is basically the same as the home air purifier.
sentences.chinese: 其作用原理與家用的空氣淨化器基本上是相同的。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the in-doors air condition and the factors affecting the air quality of Guangzhou metro.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解影響廣州地鐵室內空氣質量的主要因素。

sentences.english: The heat generated in the compression phase is normally radiated into the air outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 壓縮階段產生熱量一般被輻射到建築物外的空氣中。

sentences.english: The most common method of supplying air to the bag is by a blowpipe.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的向風袋輸送空氣的方法便是用導管。

sentences.english: Tritium emits a weak form of radiation that does not travel very far in the air and cannot penetrate the skin.
sentences.chinese: 氚發出的輻射很弱，在空氣傳播不遠，不能穿透皮膚。

sentences.english: Natasha's voice rang out in the frost -bound air.
sentences.chinese: 在冰凍天氣的冷空氣中傳來娜塔莎的說話聲。

sentences.english: Kim Gabel says the bin needs holes so the worms can get air.
sentences.chinese: 金加貝爾說，孔斌需要這樣的蠕蟲可以得到空氣。

sentences.english: The air can be humidified and dried according to the need.
sentences.chinese: 空氣能夠根據需要被加溼或除溼。

sentences.english: Microorganism in the air gone into the lake affected water quality of it.
sentences.chinese: 空氣中的微生物進入水體影響衡水湖的水質。

definition: to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]

to feel/to sense/to detect/to perceive/to become aware
